messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Report

Thanks to the tireless efforts of our security and intelligence divisions, there are currently no credible threats to Maconha Station 13. All station construction projects have been authorized. Have a secure shift!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Maconha Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Mysterious Figure

A mysterious figure has been detected on sensors at Central Primary Hallway

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Bioscans indicate that not more than 15 rodents have swarmed into maintenance tunnels.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: A%2&GE$ A ESTAÇÃO $@SFGH51 FOI TOMADA PELOS ALIEN LOKO AS@WEX1-1

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Xenobiology Lab.
